wines.description: A distinguished 2018 bottling that presents tobacco and blackberry. Ideal for both casual sipping and special occasions.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with intense aromas of floral and dark fruits, followed by layered notes of spice. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, structured takes center stage, complemented by fruit-forward and complex. The smooth texture and integrated structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The long finish is refined and persistent, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: From the 2018 vintage, expect vanilla and plum. Represents excellent value for this quality level.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with subtle aromas of spice and oak, followed by nuanced notes of earth. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, balanced takes center stage, complemented by structured and fruit-forward. The polished texture and cohesive structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The extended finish is polished and smooth, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wines.description: This 2018 selection delivers dark chocolate and oak. Shows the hallmark characteristics of its terroir.

tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, complex takes center stage, complemented by balanced and structured. The refined texture and elegant structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The enduring finish is sophisticated and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wines.description: This 2018 expression showcases blackberry and dark fruits. Perfect for current enjoyment or short-term cellaring.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with delicate aromas of blackberry and pepper, followed by pure notes of smoke. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, dark fruits takes center stage, complemented by licorice and bold. The silky texture and well-balanced structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The persistent finish is graceful and intense, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: Crafted in the modern style, this wine reveals cedar and firm tannins. A wine that balances tradition with modern winemaking.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with pronounced aromas of oak and earth, followed by complex notes of floral. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, structured takes center stage, complemented by fruit-forward and complex. The velvety texture and harmonious structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The lingering finish is elegant and smooth, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, silky takes center stage, complemented by red fruits and spice. The smooth texture and integrated structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The long finish is refined and lingering, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wines.description: This 2023 selection delivers tropical fruits and toasted oak. Shows the hallmark characteristics of its terroir.

tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, toasted oak takes center stage, complemented by mineral and creamy. The refined texture and elegant structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The enduring finish is sophisticated and crisp, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.
